Our dishes are made from the freshest ingredients and served with love. catering Reviews Review by - Yelp Sarah M: I was kind of craving for some Middle Eastern food once I saw this place pop up on my maps, and I was impressed by the quality and service of the food here! If you're looking for a quick and cheap meal that is different from your typical.. Review by - Yelp Beatriz O: I ordered the shawarma plate and was completely satisfied and happy with it. It was delicious. Portions match the price. I couldn't finish mine but that because I stuffed my face with their delicious bread with fresh garlic sauce, olives.. Review by - Yelp Lauren H: So great! Really absolutely delicious. The service was so kind and welcoming. The food was amazing. I love Middle Eastern food. This was fantastic. All the spices and seasonings were spot on. The grilled shrimp were amazing. Heads on you know they're.. Review by - Yelp Greg B: This place was Amazing! They bring a bread and three different garnishes for all tables. The bread was very light and fluffy. It had air inside, very hot and soft. The garlic sauce was like a very strong tahini sauce. The corn mixture was good. The.. Review by - Yelp Allison H: I absolutely love this restaurant. The atmosphere, the staff, the food, everything is so exquisite and I love bringing new friends here. Normally I come with my mother in law and sister in law. We always get the trio dish with their incredible pita bread..
